content:
V65 Full System Verification (REAL API CALLS - NO MOCKS):
- Research APIs: 4/4 working (Exa neural search, Tavily factual, Perplexity sonar, Firecrawl 310k chars)
- Core tests: 177/177 passed (retry, circuit breaker, dedup, error recovery, memory quality)
- RAG tests: 119/119 passed (synthesis TextRank/LexRank, entity extraction, knowledge graph NetworkX+PageRank)
- Ralph Loop: #1003 SUCCESS (Health OK=10/WARN=1/ERR=1, Validation PASS=4/WARN=1)
- Memory: 500+ blocks, 21 insights, auto-cleanup active
- Claude Flow V3: Self-learning neural capabilities, autonomous adaptation, specialized expert routing
- Adapters: 42/42 SDK hardened with retry+circuit breaker+timeout
- MCP: 11 active servers, ~100k tokens recovered from disabled servers
